name: @rakered/mongo
description: A tiny but elegant wrapper around the native mongodb driver for Node.js, removing boilerplate and fixing id generation.
author: Stephan Meijer <stephan@meijer.ws>

scripts.bump:patch: npm version patch -m 'release(mongo): cut the %s release'
scripts.bump:minor: npm version minor -m 'release(mongo): cut the %s release'
scripts.bump:major: npm version major -m 'release(mongo): cut the %s release'
